mapper.select: SELECT coll."collectAt",coll."collectBy",coll."comentId",pu."title",pu."cotent",us."username" FROM "xacx_information_push_collection" coll join xacx_information_push pu on pu."id" = coll."comentId" join xacx_user us on us."pernr" = coll."collectBy" WHERE "collectBy" = #{collectBy} order by "collectAt" desc LIMIT #{pageSize} offset #{startIndex};
SELECT count(*) FROM "xacx_information_push_collection" where "collectBy" = #{collectBy} and "comentId" =#{comentId} and to_date(cast("collectAt" as TEXT),'yyyy-mm-dd') = current_date
